pages.text: $(li)The Map is a useful item that can be used to view explored terrain and mark landmarks.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/cartographer)Cartographers$(/l) will exchange this item by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
$(li)You can find Maps in Loot Chests too.$(br)$(li)Maps and Empty Maps can be inserted in an $(l:patchouli:tools/charm/atlas)Atlas$(/l) to have a very big map in one only item.
$(li)To use a Map, first right click in an Empty Map. Then, just explore the surroundings until the Map is complete.
$(li)A Map can be placed in an $(l:patchouli:decoration/quark/item_frame)Item Frame$(/l) to use it like part of your decoration.
